      • convertTimeFromStringToDate

        public static java.util.Date convertTimeFromStringToDate(java.lang.String sourceDate,
                                                         java.lang.String strDateFormat,
                                                         java.lang.String timezone)
        Return a data with new format and timezome. author: zhangyutao create on 2014-03-04
        Parameters:
        sourceDate - the data you want convert, it should be in standard data format.More format refer to SimpleDateFormat.SimpleDateFormat(String)
        strDateFormat - format like "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss". More format refer to SimpleDateFormat.SimpleDateFormat(java.lang.String, java.text.DateFormatSymbols)
        timezone - like "America/Los_Angeles".More format refer to java.util.TimeZone#getTimeZone(String)
        Returns:
        Return a data with new format and timezome
